Description: Brazilian aircraft manufacturer Embraer S.A. entered into an agreement to resolve criminal charges and agreed to pay a penalty of more than $107 million in connection with schemes involving the bribery of government officials in the Dominican Republic, Saudi Arabia and Mozambique, and to pay millions more in falsely recorded payments in India via a sham agency agreement.

NAICS Translation: 488190: Other Support Activities for Air Transportation
